title: Development in economic and social changes

content.description: Development results in a number of economic and social changes within a country.
content.question:
Respond to parts A and B.

A. Identify primary, secondary, and tertiary economic activities.

B. Explain TWO different reasons for each of the following changes that typically occur as a country develops over time. 

1. Declines in primary sector employment

2. Decreases in infant mortality rate

3. Improvements in women’s social status

frqParts.text:
Respond to parts A and B.

A. Identify primary, secondary, and tertiary economic activities.

B. Explain TWO different reasons for each of the following changes that typically occur as a country develops over time. 

1. Declines in primary sector employment

2. Decreases in infant mortality rate

3. Improvements in women’s social status

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
